column4: I know wireless G usually does not reach 54Mbit theoretical speeds, but in between 2 wireless G  computers and a wireless g router, what practical speed should I expect?
both on wireless? not much, probably a little over 1mB/s
okay -- I'm getting about 800kB/s so I'm not too far.. *wrinkles nose
yeah, sounds reasonable.. wireless is really bad when you have more than one active peer on the network :)
